statements: SELECT * FROM DataConsistency;
SELECT id, data FROM DataConsistency ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, data FROM DataConsistency WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DataConsistency WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, data, created_at FROM DataConsistency WHERE updated_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM DataConsistency WHERE id = 100;
SELECT id, data FROM DataConsistency WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY data DESC;
SELECT id, data, updated_at FROM DataConsistency WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT id, data, created_at, updated_at FROM DataConsistency WHERE data LIKE '%example%' AND id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5);
SELECT id, data, created_at FROM DataConsistency WHERE updated_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT post_content, created_at FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, username AS user_name FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT email FROM users WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 1 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, created_at FROM posts WHERE user_id = 5 AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, p.post_content FROM users u JOIN posts p ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE u.id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM posts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_orders > 5 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;

SELECT u.username, p.product_name, o.quantity FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY o.quantity DESC, p.product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM distributed_systems;
SELECT id, description FROM distributed_systems ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT description, status FROM distributed_systems WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM nodes WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT event, log_time FROM logs WHERE event LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM distributed_systems WHERE status = true ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT description, status FROM distributed_systems WHERE description LIKE '%data%' ORDER BY status ASC;
SELECT * FROM nodes WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT node_id, capacity FROM nodes WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT event, log_time FROM logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE is_available = TRUE ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, rating, comment FROM Reviews WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM Users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT order_id, u.username AS user_username, p.product_name AS product_name, quantity, order_date FROM Orders o JOIN Users u ON o.user_id = u.user_id JOIN Products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id;
